name: Mama (Charred Axolotl)
description:
A very simple high-score-based game where you, a baby dragon, attempt to keep your mother alive for as long as possible. The forest you've found yourself in, though, has a mysterious energy about it, and you'll need to fight against it to grab the crystals keeping your mama alive.

Move with Arrow Keys, WASD, or a gamepad's control stick/D-Pad.

This game was made for Ludum Dare 50, which had the theme "Delay the inevitable."
